data.event: It was incorporated on September 22, 1851, as Fort Des Moines which was shortened to "Des Moines" in 1857.
It was incorporated on September 22, 1851, as Fort Des Moines which was shortened to "Des Moines" in 1857.

event.title: is ranked 91st in terms of population in the United States with 599,789 residents according to the 2013

data.event: The five-county metropolitan area is ranked 91st in terms of population in the United States with 599,789 residents according to the 2013 estimate by the United States Census Bureau.

event.title: ranked Des Moines as the "Best Place for Business" in both 2010

data.event: Forbes magazine ranked Des Moines as the "Best Place for Business" in both 2010 and 2013.
In 2014, NBC ranked Des Moines as the "Wealthiest City in America" according to its criteria.
